title: Chapter 850 - My Past Life And Current Self Are Not The Same
body:
Chapter 850 - My Past Life And Current Self Are Not The Same

Only an hour remained until dawn.

The destructive energy fluctuations of the Golden Crow Annihilating Calamity Formation rippled on the walls of Ziluo City.

The army of evil spirits that had invaded the city was gone; Moonlit Shadow’s sword light had reduced them to nothingness.

Outside the city, countless evil spirits still charged toward the city, but they were like dragons without a leader; they weren’t much of a threat. Before they even got close, the Golden Crow Annihilating Calamity Formation destroyed them.

Atop the eastern gate.

The gaunt old man, Tianji Yao Empress, and the man in Confucian robes watched the scene unfolding at the Bureau of Adjudication, their expressions incomparably complicated. 

Although they couldn’t make out the details, all three of the old monsters were well aware that a terrifying evil spirit of legend, the Dark Vassal, had been slain!

The Nine Serenities Netherworld Crow, Sinful Ghost Monk, and Child of Sin wouldn’t escape disaster either!

“All of it happened in a flash. This was a calamity sufficient to destroy the Cui Family and overturn Ziluo...
original_title: Chapter 850 - My Past Life and Current Self Are Not the Same
